about_the_game:
Office Affairs: Executive Decisions is a mature, open-world RPG that blends the intrigue of high-stakes corporate drama with the complexities of modern relationships. Set in the fast-paced world of corporate finance and business development, players step into the shoes of an ambitious executive navigating a volatile world where power, passion, and politics collide.

In Office Affairs: Executive Decisions, every choice matters. As you rise through the ranks of your corporation, you’ll need to balance your professional ambitions with complex personal relationships. Will you climb the corporate ladder with integrity, or will you engage in cutthroat tactics to achieve your goals? Meanwhile, romantic entanglements and office liaisons can lead to both rewarding partnerships or dangerous betrayals.

The open-world design allows players to explore a fully realized corporate cityscape, including sleek office towers, trendy bars, and secretive boardrooms. Each location offers unique opportunities for career advancement or romantic escapades, with a wide cast of characters, each with their own motivations, secrets, and personal agendas.

As you make pivotal executive decisions, you’ll navigate a range of morally gray scenarios—from deciding which colleagues to trust, to balancing the demands of the boardroom with the desires of your heart. But beware—every action has consequences, and both your personal life and career can unravel if you make the wrong move.

In this detailed, character-driven RPG, power and passion are intertwined. The real question is: How far will you go to get what you want? Stunning 3D environments and Animations: Immerse yourself in a beautifully rendered world with high-detail 3D graphics and full-motion animations. Watch as the characters come to life, expressing a range of emotions in captivating scenes.

Name: Lily Chen

Age: 28

Sexual Orientation: Bisexual

Lily is a talented graphic designer who works at a marketing agency in the heart of the city. She's confident, independent, and fiercely loyal to her friends. Lily has been friends with James since college, and they've remained close even after graduation.

As a bisexual woman, Lily is comfortable with her sexuality and enjoys exploring new relationships. She often gives James advice on his love life, encouraging him to be open to unexpected possibilities.

Name: Rachel Martin

Age: 27

Occupation: Marketing Manager

Personality: Rachel is confident, ambitious, and independent. She has a sharp wit and isn't afraid to speak her mind. She's also fiercely loyal to those she cares about and will go to great lengths to protect them. She has a passion for fitness and healthy living, and often spends her free time at the gym or trying new workout classes.

Background: Rachel grew up in a small town in the Midwest and moved to the city after college to pursue a career in marketing. She quickly rose through the ranks at her company, thanks to her hard work and natural talent. She's had her fair share of relationships, but has never found anyone who truly understands her the way James does.

Name: Emily Alvarez

Age: 28

Occupation: Marketing Manager

Personality Traits:

- Creative and imaginative
- Ambitious and driven
- Empathetic and compassionate
- Outgoing and social
- Impulsive and prone to taking risks

Background:

Emily grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but always dreamed of bigger things. She was drawn to the world of marketing and advertising from a young age, fascinated by the power of persuasion and the ability to create something from nothing. She studied marketing in college and quickly rose through the ranks in her field, becoming a marketing manager at a major corporation by the age of 25.

Name: Sarah Springfield

Age: 26

Occupation: Marketing Associate

Personality: Sarah is a charming and confident young woman, who always knows what she wants and isn't afraid to go after it. She is a social butterfly, and loves to be the center of attention. Her confidence often borders on arrogance, but she manages to get away with it because of her magnetic personality.

Backstory: Sarah grew up in a wealthy family, and was always given everything she wanted. She was popular in high school and always had a large group of friends, but never really had any deep connections. In college, she studied marketing and quickly landed a job at the company where she currently works. She has been successful in her career, but often feels like she is missing out on something in her personal life.

Name: Alexis Lee

Age: 27

Occupation: Marketing Manager

Personality: Alexis is a confident and ambitious woman, with a no-nonsense attitude when it comes to her work. She is highly competitive and driven, constantly striving to be the best in everything she does. She is very intelligent and strategic, often approaching problems with a level head and logical solutions. However, her intense focus on her career can make her seem cold and distant to those around her.

Background: Alexis grew up in a wealthy family, where success was highly valued. She attended an Ivy League university and graduated with a degree in marketing, quickly climbing the ranks at her company. Despite her success, she often feels that she has something to prove to her family, and fears being seen as a failure.

Name: Angela Carter

Age: 38

Occupation: CEO of a marketing firm

Background: Angela is a self-made woman who worked her way up from an intern to the CEO of a successful marketing firm. She grew up in a middle-class family and put herself through college while working two jobs. She is fiercely independent and driven, with a no-nonsense attitude towards work.

Name: Anna Thompson

Age: 28

Occupation: Office Intern

Background: Anna grew up in a small town in the Midwest and always dreamed of living in a big city. She's worked hard to establish herself in the industry, but still feels like she's not quite where she wants to be. She's outgoing and confident, but often struggles with self-doubt and imposter syndrome.

Personality: Anna is a people person, always looking to connect with others and make new friends. She's quick-witted and charming, but can also be impulsive and reckless at times. She's fiercely independent and doesn't like to be tied down, but also values her close relationships deeply.

Office Affairs is a thrilling visual novel game that offers a unique blend of romance, drama, and career-building in an office setting. Explore intricate relationships, uncover secrets, and make life-changing decisions as you navigate the complexities of love and professional ambitions. Will you find the perfect balance or succumb to the challenges that arise? The choice is yours.

content_descriptors.notes:
Penetration
Ejaculation
Female Ejaculation
Full Nudity
Harems

name: Office Affairs : Executive Decisions

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1080 and higher ; ATI radeon RX and higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 equivalent or greater ; ATI radeon RX and higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated or higher

short_description: Office Affairs: Executive Decisions is a mature, open-world RPG that blends the intrigue of high-stakes corporate drama with the complexities of modern relationships. Set in the world of corporate finance, step into a world where power, passion, and politics collide.
